definition: who would have thought/unexpectedly
who/also pr. [shui2]
to know/to be aware
God knows.../Who would have imagined...?

sentences.english: Was this a lover, or a lecher whether?
sentences.chinese: 谁知这究竟是恋爱，还是瞎胡闹？

sentences.english: Who would have thought things are unpredictable, they are also very pick.
sentences.chinese: 谁知世事难料，她们也都很挑。

sentences.english: However, a black bear monster came out unexpectedly. He concealed the cassock under the shield of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 可谁知这时来了只黑熊怪，他趁火劫走了袈裟。

sentences.english: Who knows the dishes food, each grain is hard.
sentences.chinese: 谁知盘中餐，粒粒皆辛苦。

sentences.english: However, a black bear monster came out unexpectedly. He  concealed the cassock under the shield of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 可谁知这时来了只黑熊怪，他趁火劫走了袈裟。

sentences.english: Who would have thought Xu hands energetically will actually strangled his mother alive.
sentences.chinese: 谁知，徐某竟手上使劲将母亲活活勒死了。

sentences.english: YiFan with xiaoyan illustrates his ideas, but be xiaoyan poured cold water.
sentences.chinese: 一帆跟晓燕说明了自己的想法，谁知被晓燕泼了冷水。

sentences.english: However, it was also the turning point for Rooney.
sentences.chinese: 谁知这场比赛却成了鲁尼的一个转折点。

sentences.english: Ann came to see me when I was in hospital. She was a real Job's comforter!
sentences.chinese: 我住院时安来看我，谁知她的安慰使我更难受。

sentences.english: But in his first season, the team is terrible and management fires him.
sentences.chinese: 谁知第一球季，球队的表现惨不忍睹，他因而被辞退。

sentences.english: Who knows dew river suddenly pregnant, and Jin Yuzhe registration married, went to Germany.
sentences.chinese: 谁知河露拉突然怀孕，和金宇哲登记结婚，去了德国。

sentences.english: Be poems, the doctor says we have to use needle wound joints put together.
sentences.chinese: 可谁知，医生却说必须要用针把伤口缝起来。

sentences.english: But Semo broke the mirror into pieces.
sentences.chinese: 谁知镜子被色嫫摔成了碎片。

sentences.english: But to these words I hearkened in vain for a reply. I grew impatient.
sentences.chinese: 谁知我说了这句话，怎么听都听不到一声回答。

sentences.english: When Chou Chin awoke and saw where he was, he cried loudly and struck his head on the plate again.
sentences.chinese: 谁知周进睁眼看见号板，放声大哭，又一头撞去。

sentences.english: Who would have thought a needle down, then pain.
sentences.chinese: 谁知，一针下去，便疼痛难忍。

definition: who would have thought that/who would have expected that
unexpectedly/to one's surprise
who would have thought that/who would have expected that
who would have imagined?/unexpectedly
didn't expect
who would have thought?/who could have imagined?/unexpectedly
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed
God knows.../Who would have imagined...?
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
to be just about to/to be on the point of
just as expected/told you so
in a fit of pique/in a fury
by coincidence/it so happened that/fortunately/against expectation
lit. Cheng Yaojin ambushes the enemy (saying)/fig. sb shows up unexpectedly and disrupts the plan/sb whose presence is regarded as irksome
pinyin: ban4 lu4 sha1 chu1 ge4 Cheng2 Yao3 jin1

definition: not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
